name: Dragon Age: Origins

task.name: winetricks
task.app: devenum directx9 dxdiagn physx quartz wmp9 wsh57

content:
exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Dragon Age Origins/DAOriginsLauncher.exe
files:
- file1: N/A:Select the game's setup file
game:
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Dragon Age Origins
    executable: file1
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: devenum directx9 dxdiagn physx quartz wmp9 wsh57
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
